titleInfo.title: Sketch plan of the proposed site for a consulate at Ahwaz

physicalDescription.extent: Materials:Pen and ink with crayon on paperDimensions:227 x 300 mm

mods.abstract: Distinctive Features:Hand drawn sketch plan showing land near the KƒÅrun River at Ahwaz with proposed site for the consulate indicated by blue pecked line. Properties outlined in colour and labelled for reference with dimensions inserted in pencil. Signed at the bottom left-hand corner.
